title: Nmap Service Enumeration
description: An engaging challenge to practice and improve your Nmap skills by examining potentially misconfigured services on a server.
hints: Try using Nmap to scan the target IP provided.
Look for common ports that might be open on a server.
Check the running services, especially the web server, for the flag.
learningObjectives: Understand the basics of Nmap and service enumeration
Analyze Nmap output to find running services
Identify potential vulnerabilities in exposed services
